title: Police Blotter for June 3, 2018
content: New York State Police   Monday, May 21: Eugene M. Kinch, 55, of Earlville, was charged in Lebanon with exposure of a person.    Sunday, May 13: Shawn M. Jarvis, 32, of Morrisville, was charged in Sullivan with petty larceny.    Wednesday, May 2: A thirteen-year-old, of Hamilton, was charged in Morrisville with fourth-degree criminal mischief.
